home.about:
I'm a Developer passionate about solving problems using code!
I started 4 years ago studying Front-End by myself.
I'm currently working at NTT DATA, a multinational consulting services company. Providing outsourced to the AB InBev (Anheuser-Busch Inbev). There I work with React Developer, using best pratices of development.
I have a different perspective on development, Because I worked as QA, always bringing unit tests and automated tests to guarantee the delivery, like this always prioritizing deployments with minimal bugs.
